title: Basic ratatouille
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 large aubergine, cut into slices', '1 large (or 2 small) courgette, cut into slices', '500g chopped tomatoes', '1 pepper, cut into strips', '1 tablespoon herbes de Provence', 'salt and pepper to taste']
